title: Gigabyte Aero 17 (2020) Review - Performance ISN'T Everything
description: The the 2020 version of Gigabyte's Aero 17 HDR XB includes an i7-10875H and NVIDIA RTX 2070 Super Max-Q giving it a ton of performance.  The Aero 17 used to be one of the best gaming / creator notebooks but with the same design being used for more than two years now, can it really compete?    Buy items in this video from our partners at the links below.   Note we have temporarily halted posting NEW Amazon links.  Aero 17 HDR XB -   Aero 17 XB -    ASRock X299 CLX -      Subscribe    Review unit provided as a loaner free of charge by Gigabyte. This video is sponsored by ASRock. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #aero172020 #bestgamingnotebook2020 #hardwarecanucks
